sources.title: The Flame of Love
sources.description: Title: The Flame of Love Summary: In Russia, a Chinese dancer gives herself to a duke to save her brother's life. Directed by: Richard Eichberg, Walter Summers Actors: Production Company: British International Pictures (BIP) Release Date: 31 October 1930 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.20 : 1 In Russia, a Chinese dancer gives herself to a duke to save her brother's life.

metadata.Plot: In Russia, a Chinese dancer gives herself to a duke to save her brother's life.
metadata.Writer: Monckton Hoffe, Adolf Lantz, Walter Summers
metadata.Actors: Anna May Wong, Georg H. Schnell, John Longden
